concerning-behavior-vocab
=========================

**Misuse of Company Resources** (1)

    Using or abusing company resources in an unauthorized manner

**Technical Policy Abuse** (2)

    Violating policies regarding the use of the organization's IT systems

**Interpersonal Issues** (3)

    Conflicts with others in the organization or human resources (HR) issues

**Financial** (4)

    Financial conflicts of interest or significant changes to financial status

**Organizational Conflict** (5)

    Competitive conflicts of interest with the organization

**Suspicious Contact** (6)

    Suspicious communication with or travel to entities, areas, or individuals that present a conflict of interest with the organization

**Relocation** (7)

    Physical relocation
